title: Alexander/Ballet/Calder: An Alphabetical guide to Calder and the Dance, a discussion with Jed Perl
desc: Join the Center for Ballet and the Arts for a discussion with writer and resident fellow Jed Perl.? Perl will discuss Calder's interest and involvement with dance, ranging from his? collaborations with Martha Graham to a series of experiments on the theme of a ?ballet without dancers? that began in the 1930s and culminated in  Work in Progress , the theatrical event Calder mounted at the Rome Opera House in 1968.
